body_html:
More updates: using cuda 7.5, the same behavior occurs even when num_gpu is set to 1.
Subsequently, I reproduced a similar behavior using cuda 7.0 with num_gpu set to 2, though this time it took about 9hours before freezing.
body_text:
More updates: using cuda 7.5, the same behavior occurs even when num_gpu is set to 1.
Subsequently, I reproduced a similar behavior using cuda 7.0 with num_gpu set to 2, though this time it took about 9hours before freezing.
body:
More updates: using cuda 7.5, the same behavior occurs even when num_gpu is set to 1. 
Subsequently, I reproduced a similar behavior using cuda 7.0 with num_gpu set to 2, though this time it took about 9hours before freezing.
